Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Came for Sunday brunch and had the most amazing chicken and waffles. The chicken texture is spot on and had a nice cornflake crust. The waffles are buttery and 'melt-in-your-mouth'. Was completely empty besides me which surprised me a bit. ‚Ä¶

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text:
Burger was tasty and pleasantly surprised me.

I would recommend to make the buns thinner and have a smaller diameter so it ‚Ä¶

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Great vegan restaurant! Even my non-vegan boyfriend loved the food. You can sit outside and watch people walking by. We had a a sandwich, a burger, cheese fries, a milkshake, soft ice and a cookie dough cookie. Everything tasted amazing and ‚Ä¶

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Beautiful setup, lovely interior, nice staff and very friendly. The White Russian and my burger was so good. Definitely coming back.

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text:
Deliscious burger with quinoa and beer beans! The beyond burger was also super good! Vegan Walk Amsterdam top stop!!
Went back again, tried new burgers and dessert, sooo good!!! Nacho Burger was amazing (i removed the coriander garnish) and cheese sauce is deliscious!!

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Amazing vegan Burgers we got here. You have to go there this place is fantastic. Super sweet pink interior and comfy. But the food is... I mean there is no word to describe it. Come and try it out. We orderd fries to our meal which where delicious. Really really good food. Thanks for making my stomach sooo full and me so happy

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Just had Deer Mama's BbQ Burger with sweet potato fries and the most amazing vegan milkshake ever: Pandan!, Pineapple and Coconut!!! The flavours.. definitely my go-to shake from now on ..

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: So; The food was delicious, the price was very fair, the staff was kind and very good even though only one server was working to serve half the place filled, quite impressive. Their English is flawless for those who care and so is most ‚Ä¶

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text:
My girlfriend and I love Deer mama, we often grab a few snacks when passing by.
They have the best vegan cakes and treats in Amsterdam and their food is all round to die for, if you are vegan or even if you're not, Deer mama is a MUST!!!!!!!

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: The milkshakes are fun and worth a visit. The staff is great and very friendly. But, don‚Äôt bother with the food‚Äî expensive and not very fresh. It seems the kitchen is doing more assembly than cooking.  The burgers can be made better at home.

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Delicious and indulging dishes, great milkshakes, good coffee, very friendly service. Galaxy pancakes were incredibly delicious. Ramen nooodles are very flavourful but quite spicy. Overall this place is amazing and worth a second and third visit.

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: I came here for lunch before heading to the Rijkmuseum and Deer Mama is a fantastic vegan restaurant serving lots of healthy options. The menu is not extensive, but I always say it's better to do a few things well than to do many things ‚Ä¶

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Friendly staff, good food, and if you got a sweet tooth you should try out their "milkshakes". The quinoa burger could do with a bit more bite, but the fried chicken and waffles were on point. Great for when you just started being vegan... Pardon the terrible photography from my side...

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text:
O - M - G

That's a place to visit and re-visit üòç ‚Ä¶

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Both the BBQ burger and milkshake were amazing and delicious. All the ladies from the staff were lovely and really nice, I would highly recommend it!

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: It was very tasty. The Mylk shake was awesome as well!

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: After over a year, I finally sat inside a restaurant for a meal and this was a perfect choice. Cozy restaurant, great staff, great food and drinks. ‚Ä¶

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: It's nice that it's all vegan, but the burgers are very plain, I'm recommending to make it a bit more delicious and saucy.

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Omg one of the best vegan restaurants in Amsterdam! I looooved the chocolate cookie dough milkshake, the banh mi as well as the char siur ü§§ we went there twice because it was so good! All the cakes and cupcakes looked super yummy as well. ‚Ä¶

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Service was incredibly friendly, interior looks very cute, but the food was not what could've been. We ordered the BBQ and the Tempea burgers with both sweet potato and regular fries, the Mushroom Croquettes, the Ginger Beer Float and ‚Ä¶

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Three stars for being overpriced. Other than that, service and quick and pleasant. We ate dinner around 1840 and Deer Mama was packed! ‚Ä¶

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: This place is so lovely! Staff is very welcoming and interior is super cute. We stop by every time we are in Amsterdam and so far, we‚Äôve never been disappointed. I loved their ‚Äúno-duck‚Äù banh mi! Also, some of their dishes are insta worthy

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Really enjoyed this place! The burgers are amazing, but so is everything else! Also super friendly staff and amazing service! The lady serving us was super cute as well

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: We really wanted to love this place but unfortunately the food was not that good. Amsterdam‚Äôs competitive dinning scene has so much amazing food to offer so I‚Äôm sure we won‚Äôt be back to Deer Mama. The service was great and everyone was ‚Ä¶

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Omg where should I begin!!! Deer mama offers the best beyond meat burger ever: incredible texture and taste that will make you question whether it‚Äôs actual meat or not. Amazing cakes (chocolate and peanut butter was incredible) and the cookies/cookie dough are the best <3

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: This place is so nice! The vibe it gives, the nice people who work there and its Food! The burgers they have there is such a great quality! And its also good to know that they serve a vegan softserve which is so delicous! Actually I just ‚Ä¶

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Best vegan food, mylkshakes and sweets! ‚ù§Ô∏è Amazing interior, super helpful staff and great atmosphere!

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Okay this is a weird thing to share but we came here mostly because we needed to use the restroom and ended up sitting to order coffee. My brother decided to order a burger, we had no idea that the place was vegan we didn't think much of ‚Ä¶

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: I had the Green Monster with sweet potatoes, I wish the portion was bigger. The food was good. The place was too cold and not really cozy. The whole vegan concept was cool though.

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Lovely place for milkshakes, waffles, pancakes, and more! It is a bit on the pricey side, with just one donut being 4,50‚Ç¨. However, I had a meal here with my wife; a milkshake and three tacos (rather unconventional fillings like pineapple) ‚Ä¶

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Great Vegan burger and sandwich place. A bit out of town but worth it. Had their Vietnamese flavoured char siu Banh Mi which was absolutely delicious. Burgers are quite popular as well. Their cakes looked better than they tasted. The interior is quite pretty and artistic with paintings.

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Vegan milkshakes and burgers. What is there not to like? Incredibly delicious! Mama‚Äôs double cheesy burger will undoubtedly satisfy even the hungriest person in the crew. Name: Deer Mama
Review Text:
I really liked this place.
The burgers were delicious and the milkshake just tasted like a normal one.
Will surely come back!

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: shoutout to the staff! they have a very nice energy. the burgers were very good as well. worth a visit but for us not very often since it‚Äôs very pricy.

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: The food is delicious!!!  The pooled out mushrooms burger was amazing (it is a bit spicy, but not to spicy) and the lemon tart....nomnomnom! The space is very nice and airy and kids friendly! I would definitely go back!

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Very nice staff, great boozy milkshakes and a the most realistic vegan burger I ever had. I can also recommend the bitterballen. Service isn't quick, but very friendly and helpful.

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: This used to be one of my favourite places to go. The milkshakes, soft serve and cakes really make them stand out from all the other vegan places to go to. Something else that made Deer Mama really special in my opinion were the amazing ‚Ä¶

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: my tummy is happy! Yes mama, there‚Äôs a new vegan mama in town. Amazing food, the BBQ burger is really good. Especially the vegan cheddar is to DIE FOR. Also good selection of cocktails and beers. Service is great and very energetic. ‚Ä¶

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Absolutely delicious options and all very fresh! I'm not vegan, but I enjoy meeting friends there for a meal. The sweet potato fries are my favorite

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: YES!! Amazing place. Super cool interior, crisp and clean, very well styled. The waitress and kitchen personnel were super friendly and professional. The menu is nice and you get a good portion for a very fair price. Wil definitely be coming back here to try one of the milkshakes!

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text:

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Another new vegan place in town! Competition is getting bigger and the bar is set higher. We had the millionaire burger and the bowl with pulled mushrooms, soft serve for dessert. ‚Ä¶

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Awesome place! Wonderful interior design, it has that american style diner vibe we all know well from the movies. The staff is very nice and friendly. The food is super tasty, but the absolute winner is the mylkshake! A-MAZING!

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: They offer a super nice range of feel good food. The pulled jackfruit & the black bean burgers were both outrageous. And their home made soft serve was the cherry on the pie(they also do amazing pies btw) ‚Ä¶

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Delicious vegan meals of generous sizes. They provide with paper boxes and bags to take away what you cannot consume at the spot. The milkshakes are pretty good, and the staff is very friendly. Recommended.

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Pretty nice, since everything is vegan. We had the thai burger which had different flavours than regular burgers, yet not totally to our taste.

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Really tasty extensive vegan menu with lots of sweet things and desserts as well as burgers and other mains! Best milkshake I've ever had. The interior is so cute and the person who served me was incredibly sweet. Will be back next time I'm in amsterdam!

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Best vegan cake ever and a lot of different choices. The food is really nice too. It is 100% a must in Amsterdam!

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Easily the best vegan junk food restaurant in Amsterdam. Hands down.

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: In general it's a really nice place. The menu is larger than some other vegan places. ‚Ä¶

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Deer Mama is absolutely the best vegan food place in the Netherlands. Cutely decorated, bit 50s diner like, their shakes look extremely cute and on top of that everything is delicious.

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: It was really nice taste but my club sandwich was completely cold and then the toast gets chewy e.g but friendly staff and nice menu . Will come back definitely

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Vegan burger bar with a nice interior and delicious food! More on the pricey side (around 14 EUR for a burger) but honestly well worth it! Fast and friendly service.

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text:
YOUUUU GUYSSSS!!! This place is amazing. The burgers are really tasty and huge!!!

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: The best food and very friendly people. Could eat there every day. The mylkshakes are to die for.

Name: Deer Mama

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Visiting from Denmark for the Amsterdam Marathon and we needed to find a vegan option, found this little gem, REALLY pleasent staff and food was really good, might even eat there again before returning home.

Name: Deer Mama

Review Text: Delicious and indulging dishes, great milkshakes, very friendly service. This place is lovely!

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Lovely staff! They have a large menu, with lots of options for lunch and dinner! The milkshakes are really tasty and worth all the calories on it. They put the cakes at the entrance, so you just fall in love with it when you arrive!

Name: Deer Mama

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Amazing food, kind service, great interior design!

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Love the atmosphere, 'pink retro diner' style. The vegan burgers are amazing. Shakes and cakes are too sweet for my liking. Pancakes a pretty good & filling!

Name: Deer Mama

Review Text: Vegane Burger Not Not creamy enoug. The Taste of the Paddy is fantastic

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: very tasty burgers and top notch milkshakes. personel was friendly aswell!

Review Text: Very good vegan good!!! Not the standard burgers but really creative and everything is homemade. The appetizers and milkshakes are also really amazing. They have been open for a few weeks and I already went there 3 times.

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Really nice food and great service, lovely little place to relax and lost of food choice. Reasonable prices too and not fair from the met.

Name: Deer Mama

Name: Deer Mama

Name: Deer Mama

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Amazing place, best vegan ice cream and mylk shakes! Good Gluten free options

Name: Deer Mama

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: The burgers are amazing and you wouldn't even think the meat isn't real meat. Their pani puri starter was also delicious and flavourful. Milkshakes were also very nice although quite pricey.

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text:
Delicious burger, and the vegan cheese sauce was amazing.
Also, they lovingly catered for us even though it was close to closing.
I will be back there soon!

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Super nice food, really kind staff. Got a lot of suggestions based on our preferences. Would totally order here again!

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Food was fine, but it sounded better on the menu, we ordered two different burgers but they tasted mostly the same, focusing more on the "extras" in the burger (sauces/vegetables) would improve it a lot.

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: I really like Deer Mama! Went there twice, and both times I was very pleasantly surprised by the great vegan food. The tempea and the pulled jackfruit burgers are so worth coming back for! Also the starters and deserts are delicious. If you crave tasty vegan food, go to Deer Mama!

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: It is so tastes like meat that I experienced confused feelings as a vegetarian

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Delicious vegan burger and nice waitress !

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: We both had the Vegan breakfast and I pimped mine up with sausage - after eating we didnt need to eat until Dinner!! Scrambled Tofu was unusual and loved the black beans.

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Good food and great milkshakes! A must go in Amsterdam when you are near!

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: I took the Funky Rice Noodles and it was really delicious. Lots of veggies and the various colours made it a great looking dish. Nice place for a vegan snack or meal. thanks a lot Laura!

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: the food and the drinks are great. staff was really nice.

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text:
Pros: friendly staff and good coffee. Cons: the food, we had burgers which were tasty but way too heavy and greasy. The fries appeared to have been fried twice. Afterwards my friend and I both felt very nauseous.
Not coming back, sorry guys.

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text:
Surprisingly satisfying.
Fun n vibrant decor n milk-bar style menu n set up.

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Nice place. Wouldn't call it cozy but it's still nicely arranged. Tasty as well.

Name: Deer Mama

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Super delicious vegan milkshake

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Very bad service when ordering a cake to take home. They said that they didn‚Äôt have enough time to make a cake for my sons birthday when they had a week to do it.  They called me only two hours in advance and missed the call, so I ended up trying to find a cake for my son on the day of his birthday.

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text:
When you stroll around in the neighbourhood you must drop by this place!
My daughers and I had lunch and later on we went back to have some dinner!
They do soft-serve, mylkshakes (with booze also), cakes, burgers and other vegan ‚Ä¶

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: The food was actually pretty damn good. The snarky service was terrible. Late, sarcastic, patronising and just straight up rude. Paying top prices for small portions is okay if the flavour is there (it is), getting snapped when asking basic questions isn‚Äôt. 1/5 would not recommend.

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Incredible vegan food selection. The sweet potato fries are to die for and having a great root beer float put it over the top. Will definitely be going back.

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: This is the best vegan burger bar! Not only do they have burgers they also have amazing desserts. I've been fantasizing about the food there since I ate there.

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Amazing milkshake - I got the chocolate chip cookie dough one and it was delicious, not too sweet. Sweet potato fries were delish, chicken burger is not bad too

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: The fancy pancake stack was very filling and delicious, i would like abit more maple sirup on it but the banana, blueberry and pecan tied it together brilliant. ‚Ä¶

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: You could 'just' go for the delicious Pani Puri, but then you would miss out on their great burgers (loved the tempeh-burger!), sandwiches (Jerusalem artichoke spread, yum!) and cakes & cookies. ‚Ä¶

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Super cute place with good food and a lot of different vegan options.

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: I had the chocolate dip cookie dough milkshake and the nacho burger with the beyond burger on in and is was the best food i have ever had. 15/10 vegan junk food bar eat your heart out.

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: 5 Spice Banh Mi is super tasty and I wouldn't have tasted that it wasn't real duck even if the vegan chef would have slapped me in the face with a block of tofu.

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: Really bad sercice. They forgot to put in our order and we were waiting, waiting and waiting... the waiter(s) were snarky and impolite. If you are into 'instagrammable' junk food, this is your place. If you're looking for plantbased whole and healthy foods in a nice atmosphere, please steer away from this place.

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: It‚Äôs a nice place for vegan food. Food was nice but not the best.

Review Text: Tasty burgers, kind staff, great milkshakes - deliciousness all over!

Review Text: The best vegan place in Amsterdam. The milkshakes are endlessly creamy, the cakes are decandant and the soft serve ice cream... Ohhhh! You'll have to go yourself to find out!

Review Text: Supergood vegan  food. Everything delicious, from drinks to desserts, gorgeous milkshakes and original menu. Plus, the pesonneel is kind, smiling and attentive. Top!

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: (Translated by Google) It took a long time before the order was there. The burger was mediocre and overpriced for what you get. No comparison to the Vegan Junk Food Bar. And then that cup of fries that you get. Really not thought about it. ‚Ä¶

Name: Deer Mama
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Eaten twice, both times top !! The dishes are in style and good taste, the service is very attentive and the place looks great. Amsterdam has a vegan pearl richer, Yes !! ‚Ä¶
